content.raw:
I'll add the argument to data and and the try except. (what do we want to except? every Exception?)

Mh I have a use cases for multiple instances of lyse on the same machine. We usually have very long measurements and while one is running we sometimes want to look at old data and play around with analyzing it. This can not be done in the same lyse instance as shots from the current measurement are pouring in. So a second lyse instance not receiving the shots would be nice. To solve this currently we just use a second machine.
content.html:
I'll add the argument to data and and the try except. (what do we want to except? every Exception?)

Mh I have a use cases for multiple instances of lyse on the same machine. We usually have very long measurements and while one is running we sometimes want to look at old data and play around with analyzing it. This can not be done in the same lyse instance as shots from the current measurement are pouring in. So a second lyse instance not receiving the shots would be nice. To solve this currently we just use a second machine.
